cards.name: Thor
cards.bio: The God of Thunder, wielding Mjolnir to protect the Nine Realms.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Thor with Mjolnir in a battle stance, thunder and lightning in the background, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Jane Foster
cards.bio: An astrophysicist and Thor's love interest, who becomes host to the Aether.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Jane Foster looking at ancient texts with the Aether swirling around her, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Loki
cards.bio: The God of Mischief, Thor's adoptive brother, known for his cunning and deception.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Loki with a mischievous grin holding his scepter, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Heimdall
cards.bio: The all-seeing and all-hearing Asgardian sentry of the Bifrost Bridge.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Heimdall standing guard at the Bifrost Bridge, gazing into the cosmos, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Sif
cards.bio: A fearsome Asgardian warrior and a good friend of Thor.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Sif in battle armor wielding a sword, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Volstagg
cards.bio: One of the Warriors Three, known for his great appetite and bulky frame.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Volstagg laughing heartily with a large axe in hand, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Fandral
cards.bio: One of the Warriors Three, known for his dashing looks and swashbuckling skills.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Fandral with a rapier, ready to duel, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Hogun
cards.bio: One of the Warriors Three, known for his grim demeanor and mastery of weaponry.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hogun with a stern face holding a mace, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Frigga
cards.bio: The Queen of Asgard and Thor's mother, skilled in magic and wisdom.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Frigga casting a spell, protective and regal, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Odin
cards.bio: The Allfather and King of Asgard, wielding Gungnir and possessing vast knowledge.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Odin sitting on his throne with Gungnir, looking powerful, from Thor: The Dark World

cards.name: Malekith
cards.bio: The leader of the Dark Elves, seeking to plunge the universe into darkness with the Aether.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Malekith with the Aether, menacing and dark, from Thor: The Dark World
